name: Vegan Ravioli Salad
description: This Mediterranean vegan ravioli salad is just perfect for hot summer days! It's super easy to prepare, fresh, healthy, and so delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ravioli according to the instructions on the package. Drain and set aside. Add a bit of olive oil so they don't stick together.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the ravioli according to the instructions on the package. Drain and set aside. Add a bit of olive oil so they don't stick together.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, prepare the remaining ingredients. Chop the zucchini and the bell pepper into small cubes. Heat some olive oil in a pan and cook the zucchini and the bell pepper for about 4 minutes on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, prepare the remaining ingredients. Chop the zucchini and the bell pepper into small cubes. Heat some olive oil in a pan and cook the zucchini and the bell pepper for about 4 minutes on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cherry tomatoes and cut them into halves. Drain the artichoke hearts and also cut them into halves. Cut the sun-dried tomatoes into strips. Wash the arugula.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash the cherry tomatoes and cut them into halves. Drain the artichoke hearts and also cut them into halves. Cut the sun-dried tomatoes into strips. Wash the arugula.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Combine all of the ingredients for the dressing in a small bowl and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: Combine all of the ingredients for the dressing in a small bowl and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients for the salad in a large bowl and add the dressing. Sprinkle with roughly chopped basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients for the salad in a large bowl and add the dressing. Sprinkle with roughly chopped basil.

keywords: ravioli salad, vegan ravioli, vegan ravioli salad
